title.text: Security Update for Exchange Server 2003 Service Pack 2 (KB931832) - Cluster

description.text: This update is for any clustered Exchange servers. A security issue has been identified that could affect your Exchange 2003 system in the following way: 1. Denial of Service 2. Elevation of Privilege. We recommend that you install this update on all Microsoft Exchange 2003 Service Pack 2 servers in your organization.
